p: Overall, all EOs showed potent antioxidant potentials and found competitive with IC50 value of standard antioxidant quercetin (21.19 ± 0.62 μg/mL). The diversity of biological applications of the plant materials mainly depends on chemical constituents as well as antioxidant potential. The study showed that EOs have potent antioxidant activity and thus, highly appropriate for their usage in various biological applications.
